examples.example: 我们应该多看到事情好的方面，而不是只盯着那一点点坏处。

translate.english: We should see more of the good aspects of things rather than just focusing on that little bit of bad.

examples.example: 每件事情都有两面性，我们要善于发现好处，同时也坦然面对可能存在的坏处。

translate.english: Everything has two sides. We should be good at discovering the advantages and also face the possible disadvantages calmly.

examples.example: 虽然这种方法可能存在一些坏处，但我们可以通过努力将其转化为好处。

translate.english: Although this method may have some disadvantages, we can transform it into advantages through efforts.
